mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysMallCnvrsUrl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MALL_ID , MALL_CNVRS_URL_TURN , SHRT_URL , WEB_URL , MOBILE_URL , ETC_DSCR , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_MALL_CNVRS_URL WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_ID = #{mallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MALL_CNVRS_URL_TURN = #{mallCnvrsUrlTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
